dataList.name: Paid Lunacy
dataList.desc: A rose-shaped crystalline material. Used for performing extractions and purchasing Enkephalin boxes.
dataList.flavor: A crystal rose that seems to be facing a certain direction at all times. This humanlike object is said to absorb the moisture from a certain river to bloom.

dataList.name: Free Lunacy
dataList.desc: A rose-shaped crystalline material. Used for performing extractions and purchasing Enkephalin boxes.
dataList.flavor: A crystal rose that seems to be facing a certain direction at all times. This humanlike object is said to absorb the moisture from a certain river to bloom.

dataList.name: Lunacy
dataList.desc: A rose-shaped crystalline material. Used for performing extractions and purchasing Enkephalin boxes.
dataList.flavor: Embracing madness is a necessary step for humans to move forward.

dataList.name: Enkephalin Module
dataList.desc: Used for entering dungeons.
dataList.flavor:
A spherical module designed for special containment.
[NOTE] Utilizing a dosage of liquid Enkephalin allows for a more stable usage compared to its gaseous form.
The Enkephalin can be converted into energy by plugging the module into the designated socket.
[CAUTION] Modularization of Enkephalin is an irreversible process; the module may only be expended via the socket.
Usage outside of intended purposes or modification is strictly forbidden.

dataList.name: Extraction Ticket
dataList.desc: Can be used to perform 1 extraction.
dataList.flavor: A consumable item weaved from Lunacy, source of Mephistopheles' extractive energy.\nIt looks like a thin sheet of paper at a glance, but something seems to be pulsating inside.

dataList.name: 10-Extraction Ticket
dataList.desc: Can be used to perform 10 extractions.
dataList.flavor: A consumable item weaved from Lunacy, source of Mephistopheles' extractive energy.\nIt looks like a thin sheet of paper at a glance, but something seems to be pulsating inside.

dataList.name: 3★-Assured 10-Extraction Ticket
dataList.desc: Can be used to perform a 10-time Extraction where one 3★ Identity is guaranteed to appear.
dataList.flavor: A special ticket with a mark on it. It can extract an Identity from a world of unlikely possibilities with certainty. The paper is fiercely beating and pulsing.

dataList.name: Thread
dataList.desc: Used for Uptying of Identities and Threadspinning of E.G.O.
dataList.flavor:
Thread is a string-like object conceived to tie all possibilities in one place.
Our company is utilizing Thread in various ways, such as Uptying Identities or Threadspinning E.G.O to better understand it.

dataList.name: Identity Training Ticket I
dataList.desc: Gives 50 Identity XP.
dataList.flavor: A ticket bearing possibilities of the past, present, and future.\n\"I found that a thought of something I never experienced placed itself firmly in my head.\"

dataList.name: Identity Training Ticket II
dataList.desc: Gives 200 Identity XP.
dataList.flavor: A ticket bearing possibilities of the past, present, and future.\n\"Hmm... I've never been to the southern quarter, so why does it feel so familiar...?\"

dataList.name: Identity Training Ticket III
dataList.desc: Gives 1000 Identity XP.
dataList.flavor: A ticket bearing possibilities of the past, present, and future.\n\"...If I could have such a convenient thing in the past, those nightmarish plights would've been so simple to overcome.\"

dataList.name: Identity Level Boost Ticket I
dataList.desc: Raises an Identity's level to up to 10.
dataList.flavor: A limit-disengaging ticket that allows an Identity to hold excess experience.\n\"Oho! Mine frame hath become more apt than ever to enact justice!\"

dataList.name: Identity Level Boost Ticket II
dataList.desc: Raises an Identity's level to up to 20.
dataList.flavor: A limit-disengaging ticket that allows an Identity to hold excess experience.\n\"It's...strangely calming. I feel like I can do things I couldn't before.\"

dataList.name: Identity Level Boost Ticket III
dataList.desc: Raises an Identity's level to up to 30.
dataList.flavor:
A limit-disengaging ticket that allows an Identity to hold excess experience.
"This thing would've been a real menace if it was available during war. Imagine fostering veterans in just seconds."

dataList.name: Enkephalin Box
dataList.desc: Recovers 60 Enkephalin when used.
dataList.flavor:
A stable container storing liquified Enkephalin.
[CAUTION] Handling this box without following the prescribed procedures may result in accidents such as Enkephalin leakage.
Unregulated ingestion of Enkephalin may cause a wide range of unverified psychopathological symptoms.

dataList.name: Thread Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 strands of Thread.
dataList.flavor: A crate of bundled possibilities.\nNo one knows how much you can draw from it.

dataList.name: Season 1 Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of random Sinners.
dataList.flavor: Egoshards were randomly harvested and stored in these boxes. Its content is a mystery.\nWhen you hold one in a quiet place, you can hear small fusses.

dataList.name: Season 1 Nominable Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of a Sinner of choice.
dataList.flavor: A crate that yields Egoshards of a Sinner you choose.\nAccording to Faust, the crate's content is determined once the manager makes their decision.

dataList.name: Season 1 Yi Sang's Egoshard
dataList.desc: Used for purchasing Yi Sang's Identities, E.G.O, and Thread from the Dispenser.
dataList.flavor:
Fleeting moments from any point in the Sinner's time condensed into physical form. The shards float in the air.
Possibilities are transient things; they drift in the realm of uncertainty unless seized.
